TopicTitle: Real Solar System Crashing on load

Articles.Content:
I have a modded install of KSP, with real solar system and the realism overhaul. When I start the game it loads the textures and meshes for all planets. When it gets to the moon, it always crashes. This is the crash log:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzwBQu9jNY8cOUdBeWNFcFF6Y3c/view?usp=sharing

This is the mod list:

Any help?

Edited October 26, 2014 by JT2227

Thanks for supplying log and modlist with versions!

Out of memory crash. You need Active Texture Management.

Still crashing... This time at Duna.

Checked my RAM and I have 6 Gigabytes available.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzwBQu9jNY8ceERhc0d6ZndQR0E/view?usp=sharing

It does say my VRam is almost a GB, but on my PC specs it still says I have 6 Gb.

I've been able to run Real solar system and realism overhaul before.

Nope, have a look:

d3d: failed to create 2D texture id=2279 w=8192 h=4096 mips=14 d3dfmt=21 [out of memory]

DynamicHeapAllocator out of memory - Could not get memory for large allocationCould not allocate memory: System out of memory!

Trying to allocate: 178956972B with 4 alignment. MemoryLabel: NewDelete

[ ALLOC_GFX ] used: 400225947B | peak: 0B | reserved: 423072216B

[ ALLOC_PROFILER ] used: 158472B | peak: 0B | reserved: 8388608B

Checked my RAM and I have 6 Gigabytes available.

Doesn't matter how much you have, but how much KSP can use. Except for Linux 64-bit KSP, KSP can only access about 3.5 GB of RAM. Any more, and it crashes.

Okay. Good to know, these are only the mods that are required for Realism Overhaul,

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84689

So I'm still confused how you're supposed to get RO to work...

Edited October 26, 2014 by JT2227

You pick and choose parts. For example, you can remove all fuel tanks because of Procedural Parts.

Also, Active Texture Management. Get the aggressive version.

Finally, lower the resolution of your planet textures as necessary (there are 8192s, 4096s, and 2048s).

Okay. Thanks I've always loved the community here.

If I get it working I'll change it to solved.

Still not working with 8192 textures...

It's always worked before with tons of mods

http://imgur.com/fcbvhDL

Edited October 26, 2014 by JT2227

Hmmm.... Everything works perfectly if I use the old version of RSS that I used with .23. (Version 6.2) Everything except for the different launch centers, only Florida is available... so it's Real Solar System that is doing something weird...

Edited October 26, 2014 by JT2227
